Text: Hi dias, just revisited my last comment to you, and I understand how the tone may have been ambiguous.  All I meant to suggest is that the scenes ARE indeed about as rough as they  get.  Love your posts, and apologize for any misunderstanding.  Thanks.
No harm done, man. Tomorrow there will be more goodies for you all to enjoy!! :)
Say, u people need to leave comments here telling me what site(s) you want me to post when TPB is down, ok? Gimme some love here, peeps!!
